### Simple vectors
```{r}
# Months of the year
months <- c("Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec")
 
# Average rainfall/precipitation in NYC during each month
precipitation <- c(3.9, 2.9, 4.1, 3.9, 4.5, 3.5, 4.5, 4.1, 4.0, 3.4, 3.8, 3.6)

print(months)
print(precipitation)
```
